Two cups are good, I prefer the sweetness of peaches
French fries are super ~ delicious enough to be crispy enough

Ri Shengsheng Kaga House Xiyue Bar

The bar in the afternoon is used as a venue for the hotel experience course.

In addition to the interesting water Xinxuan cakes, the taste is also quite good. Cut into small mouths with soybean flour can be used as a good afternoon tea snack, just be careful not to be ticked by soybean flour.

Take the restaurant at dinner and give a celebration cake.

After entering the Xi Yue, the waiter we want to eat cakes, and the waiter also intimately help prepare tableware and lighter to let us order candles.

I drink Aichi Guosheng Mao flavored wine. Because I don't like too strong alcohol flavor, I chose a safety card and drink a sweet taste. It is full of pleasing taste. Flavor

The other cup is a special adjustment of the Yueyue. The bartending is a flavoring wine mixed with red wine and plum wine. The red wine aroma is mixed with plum wine. The container was filled with a wooden box full of broken ice. In addition, two small cups were attached intimately for us

The only beauty is that the bar only opened to 11 o'clock, but the bar did not start to catch people because of time, nor did we have time pressure. The atmosphere was still easy to casually free. Let's end the perfect day with bartending ğŸ˜ƒ
